attributionColor.comment: The text color for the source attribution line expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
backgroundColor.comment: The background color of the image expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
dataValueColor.comment: The color of the data values for each entry expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
graphLineDarkColor.comment: The color to use for the right and top borders of the blot graph, expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
graphLineLightColor.comment: The color to use for the left and bottom borders of the plot graph, expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
height.comment: The height, in pixels to generate the image.
interval.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, the script should wait before data gathering and image creation again
movingAverageColor.comment: The color to use for the moving average line expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
textColor.comment: The color of the text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
url.comment: The url that provides the fear and greed information
useTor.comment: Indicates whether remote calls should use tor socks proxy for privacy.
width.comment: The width, in pixels to generate the image.
